data.eml:eml: A remarkable new species group of green seed beetles from genus Amblycerus Thunberg (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Bruchinae), with description of a new Brazilian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribeiro-Costa, Cibele Stramare, Vieira, Marcelli Krul, Manfio, Daiara, Kergoat, Gael J. (2014): A remarkable new species group of green seed beetles from genus Amblycerus Thunberg (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Bruchinae), with description of a new Brazilian species. ZooKeys 401: 31-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.401.6232, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.401.6232
